propositions.text: 林若曦 (Lin Ruoxi) is hungry.
She rubs her eyes and slowly gets out of bed.
Li Wanru (李婉如) tells her to wash up and then eat.
Lin Ruoxi asks if her father has returned.
Li Wanru states he is not back yet, as he went drinking with friends yesterday and will be back late.
Lin Ruoxi asks her mother if she has considered the matter she mentioned yesterday.
Li Wanru understands what Lin Ruoxi wants to say but hesitates.
Lin Ruoxi emphasizes the importance of the matter to her.
Li Wanru suggests they should not mention it again, referencing Lin Ruoxi's father.
Lin Ruoxi offers to talk to her father and pleads with her mother to agree.
Li Wanru sighs and agrees, but asks for a promise that Lin Ruoxi will not make her father angry.
Lin Ruoxi happily hugs Li Wanru and continues eating.
A car is heard outside, indicating her father's return.
Lin Ruoxi runs to the door and greets her father.
Lin Jianguo (林建国) enters with a box of things and smiles at Lin Ruoxi.
Lin Jianguo tells Lin Ruoxi to come over as he brought her a gift.
Lin Ruoxi asks what it is with anticipation.
Lin Jianguo tells her to open it and see.
Lin Jianguo affectionately pats Lin Ruoxi's head and greets his wife.
Li Wanru asks why he is back so early.
Lin Jianguo explains he drank too much yesterday and doesn't feel energetic, so he returned early.
Lin Jianguo places the items on the living room table.
Lin Ruoxi asks if her father is okay and if he needs hangover soup.
Lin Jianguo declines, stating he is only a bit dizzy.
Lin Jianguo sits on the sofa and asks Lin Ruoxi to come over to meet someone.
Lin Ruoxi obediently goes to her father's side and looks at the young man behind him.
Lin Ruoxi asks who the person is.
Lin Jianguo introduces the young man as her new teacher, Mr. Gu Chen (顾辰).
Lin Ruoxi looks at Gu Chen with a hint of surprise.
Lin Ruoxi greets Mr. Gu.
Gu Chen greets Lin Ruoxi with a subtle smile.
Lin Jianguo boasts about the difficulty of getting Mr. Gu for tutoring and the effort he put in.
Lin Ruoxi thanks her father for his hard work.
Lin Jianguo tells Lin Ruoxi to go attend to her own matters, as he has things to discuss with Mr. Gu.
Lin Ruoxi nods obediently and goes into her room.
Upon entering her room, Lin Ruoxi hears Li Wanru calling her.
Lin Ruoxi asks her mother what's wrong.
Li Wanru asks if Lin Ruoxi knows Gu Chen.
Lin Ruoxi nonchalantly replies that she met him at the door today.
Li Wanru expresses doubt, stating Gu Chen's gaze towards Lin Ruoxi seemed strange.
Lin Ruoxi dismisses her mother's concerns, saying Mr. Gu treats everyone the same and couldn't possibly know her.
Li Wanru still seems uncertain.
Lin Ruoxi urges her mother not to worry and promises her father won't find out.
Li Wanru sighs and agrees, but warns Lin Ruoxi to be discreet and not escalate the situation.
Lin Ruoxi assures her mother she has it under control.
Lin Ruoxi asks her mother about the discussion with her father regarding 'that matter'.
Li Wanru hesitates and whispers that her father wants to 'reconsider the matter in the long run'.
Lin Ruoxi expresses dissatisfaction, questioning the delay.
Li Wanru tries to explain her husband's stance.
Lin Ruoxi interrupts, saying she understands and is disappointed.
Li Wanru tries to comfort her, suggesting they take their time.
Lin Ruoxi states she's okay but seems troubled by her father's attitude.
Li Wanru promises to help persuade her father.
Lin Ruoxi thanks her mother gratefully.
Li Wanru tells her to wash up and eat.
Lin Ruoxi agrees and heads to the bathroom.
Lin Jianguo tells Lin Ruoxi to sit down.
Lin Ruoxi sits obediently and looks at her father.
Lin Ruoxi asks why her father came back so early today.
Lin Jianguo replies it's because he's tired.
Lin Ruoxi asks about the gift her father mentioned yesterday.
Li Wanru humorously refers to it as the gift Lin Ruoxi's father bought for her yesterday.
Lin Ruoxi is told to come over to meet someone.
Lin Ruoxi goes to Gu Chen, who is beside Lin Jianguo.
Lin Ruoxi asks who the person is.
Lin Jianguo introduces Gu Chen as her new teacher.
Lin Ruoxi looks at Gu Chen with surprise.
Lin Ruoxi greets Mr. Gu.
Gu Chen greets Lin Ruoxi with a subtle smile.
Lin Jianguo boasts about the difficulty of securing Gu Chen for tutoring.
Lin Ruoxi thanks her father.
Lin Jianguo tells Lin Ruoxi to go attend to her matters, as he needs to talk with Gu Chen.
Lin Ruoxi nods and goes into her room.
Li Wanru calls Lin Ruoxi into her room.
Lin Ruoxi asks what's wrong.
Li Wanru asks if Lin Ruoxi knows Gu Chen.
Lin Ruoxi claims she met him at the door today.
Li Wanru expresses that Gu Chen's gaze towards Lin Ruoxi seemed strange.
Lin Ruoxi dismisses her mother's thoughts, stating Gu Chen treats everyone the same and wouldn't know her.
Li Wanru still expresses doubt.
Lin Ruoxi assures her mother not to worry and promises her father won't know.
Li Wanru agrees but warns Lin Ruoxi to be careful.
Lin Ruoxi assures her mother she knows what she's doing.
Lin Ruoxi asks about the discussion with her father regarding 'that matter'.
Li Wanru says her father wants to 'reconsider the matter in the long run'.
Lin Ruoxi expresses her dissatisfaction with the delay.
Li Wanru tries to explain her husband's perspective.
Lin Ruoxi interrupts, stating she understands and is disappointed.
Li Wanru consoles her, suggesting they take their time.
Lin Ruoxi states she is alright but seems bothered by her father's stance.
Li Wanru promises to help persuade her father.
Lin Ruoxi thanks her mother gratefully.
Li Wanru tells her to wash up and eat.
Lin Ruoxi agrees and goes to the bathroom.
Lin Ruoxi sits by the window, deep in thought, looking at the dark night sky.
Li Wanru enters with a glass of milk and asks what Lin Ruoxi is thinking about.
Lin Ruoxi asks with a bitter smile if her father truly cares about her.
Li Wanru assures her that her father does care, but hesitates.
Lin Ruoxi interrupts, stating she knows her father disagrees because he thinks she isn't good enough for 'that matter'.
Lin Ruoxi smiles self-mockingly.
Li Wanru denies this.
Lin Ruoxi interrupts again, saying she knows her father's actions are for her own good.
Li Wanru tells her not to think that way.
Lin Ruoxi states she's alright but seems troubled by her father's stance.
Li Wanru consoles her, suggesting they take their time.
Lin Ruoxi states she is alright but seems troubled by her father's stance.
Li Wanru promises to help persuade her father.
Lin Ruoxi thanks her mother gratefully.
Li Wanru tells her to wash up and eat.
Lin Ruoxi agrees and goes to the bathroom.
Gu Chen enters and asks Lin Ruoxi what she is thinking about.
Lin Ruoxi asks why he is there.
Gu Chen replies he came to see her.
Gu Chen sits beside her and asks what she wants to talk about.
Gu Chen states he wants to talk about her father.
Lin Ruoxi looks at Gu Chen, confused.
Gu Chen asks if her father has been in a bad mood recently.
Lin Ruoxi starts to deny it but is interrupted by Gu Chen.
Gu Chen states he knows her father and asks if he has any worries.
Gu Chen looks at Lin Ruoxi with sincere eyes.
Lin Ruoxi hesitantly admits her father has worries but she doesn't know the specifics.
Gu Chen expresses disappointment.
Lin Ruoxi asks Gu Chen what's wrong.
Gu Chen sighs, implying something about her father.
Lin Ruoxi pleads with Gu Chen, knowing he knows her father, to help persuade him.
Gu Chen hesitates, looking at Lin Ruoxi and his cup.
Gu Chen agrees, but asks for Lin Ruoxi's promise not to anger her father.
Lin Ruoxi assures him she knows what she's doing.

Lin Ruoxi expresses her dissatisfaction with the delay.

This coat is called "Modern Rebirth - Rebirth of the Thousand-Faced Actress".
The protagonist is reborn in modern times.
The story is titled "Rebirth of the Thousand-Faced Actress".
She looks at me, and my face looks great.
She tells me that I am a good girl.
She kisses me, and I kiss her.
I love my baby.

concepts.name: Lin Ruoxi
concepts.context: The main character, a daughter in a family.

concepts.name: That matter
concepts.context: An important matter that Lin Ruoxi wants to pursue, which her father initially opposes.

concepts.name: Father's opposition
concepts.context: Lin Ruoxi's father's reluctance or disagreement regarding 'that matter'.

concepts.name: Rebirth
concepts.context: The theme of the story, indicating a protagonist has been reborn.

concepts.name: New teacher
concepts.context: Gu Chen's role for Lin Ruoxi.

concepts.name: Family discussion
concepts.context: Conversations within the family regarding Lin Ruoxi's desires and her father's stance.

concepts.name: Mother's support
concepts.context: Li Wanru's efforts to mediate and support her daughter.

concepts.name: Disappointment
concepts.context: Lin Ruoxi's emotional reaction to her father's decisions.

concepts.name: Persuasion
concepts.context: The efforts made by Li Wanru and Gu Chen to influence Lin Jianguo.

concepts.name: Gift
concepts.context: Something Lin Jianguo brought for Lin Ruoxi.

concepts.name: Concerns
concepts.context: Worries expressed by Li Wanru about Gu Chen's interaction with Lin Ruoxi.

concepts.name: Kiss
concepts.context: An action between characters, seemingly from a different context appended at the end.

concepts.name: Baby
concepts.context: An affectionate term used repeatedly, possibly from a different context appended at the end.

hierarchy.structure: The document is structured as a narrative, divided into chapters. Each chapter depicts interactions between characters, primarily focusing on the protagonist Lin Ruoxi's desire to pursue 'that matter' and her father's opposition, with her mother attempting to mediate. The introduction of Gu Chen as a new tutor adds another layer to the interpersonal dynamics. There is a clear repetition of dialogue and situations, suggesting a focus on building character relationships and emotional states rather than rapid plot progression within the provided text.
